main event: A white light, slightly elliptical, was observed moving erratically in the sky and then disappeared without apparent sound.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for a brief period of time., The light changed course erratically and moved rapidly., The witnesses observed the light disappear after being visible for a while., The sighting took place in clear weather conditions in Lincoln Park, Michigan., The report was part of the Project Blue Book investigation.
sighted object: white light with an elliptical shape
witness description: A private citizen who has worked in education for 10 years.
